items.sentence: Tom admitted that he had committed the murder.
Tom advised Mary to leave as soon as possible.
Tom didn\'t want to stay in Boston any longer.
If you see Tom, ask him how his wife is doing.
You don\'t want everyone to know, do you, Tom?
Tom\'s Japanese is improving little by little.
How many flights to Boston do you offer a day?
I want to know if you\'ve been talking to Tom.
You don\'t really want to remain here, do you?
You don\'t seem to be happy with our decision.
